title: Bug 121323: XML Edit Data Set dialog does not persist filter information
OB: The XML Edit Data Set dialog does not retain the filter information after it is closed and reopened.
EB: The XML Edit Data Set dialog should remember the filter information even after it is closed and reopened.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the application and navigate to the XML Edit Data Set dialog.
2. Apply a filter to the data set.
3. Close the dialog.
4. Reopen the XML Edit Data Set dialog.

Expected: The filter information should still be retained.
Actual: The filter information is not persisted and needs to be re-entered.
